NAME

axis-remote − AXIS Remote Interface

SYNOPSIS

axis-remote [--ping] [--reload] [--clear] [--quit] [--help]

DESCRIPTION

axis-remote is a small script to control a running AXIS GUI. Use axis-remote --help for further information.

OPTIONS

--ping

Check whether AXIS is running.

--reload

Make AXIS reload the currently loaded file.

--clear

Make AXIS clear the backplot.

--quit

Make AXIS quit.

--help

Display a list of valid parameters for axis-remote.

SEE ALSO

axis(1)

Much more information about LinuxCNC and HAL is available in the LinuxCNC and HAL User Manuals, found at /usr/share/doc/linuxcnc/.

HISTORY

None known at this time.
